attributes.action: stop paying rediculous money for real hair wigs for women who have alopecia totalis its not about vanity its about being normal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have had alopecia totallis since I was 14, I am forced to pay the nhs price of £220 for a real hair wig, why should any woman have to pay for that its not fair I will never get my hair back so this is for life
